title: Zillow, Affirm, GoDaddy, Zendesk: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Zillow’s results showed a loss tied to its now-shuttered home-flipping business; Zendesk has received takeover approaches
body:
Stock futures are wavering, pointing to a muted open following Wall Street’s selloff on the heels of inflation hitting a new four-decade high. Here’s what we’re watching in Friday’s trading:
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
